title: Best nutritious chicken and vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 to 2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 whole chicken, jointed', '1 green chilli, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon cumin seeds', '1 pinch red chilli flakes', '3 red onions, sliced into half moon shape', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', 'salt, to taste', 'whole garlic cloves, to taste', '1 (4cm piece) root ginger, cut into strips', '2 to 3 bay leaves', '3 carrots, cubed', '3 sticks celery, finely chopped', '5 to 6 mushrooms, sliced', '1 to 2 tablespoons tomato puree', '900ml chicken or vegetable stock', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'chopped fresh rosemary, to taste', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 bunch spring onions, finely chopped']
